"use client" import { useState } from "react" const Sidebar = ({ activeComponent, setActiveComponent }) => { const [expandedMenus, setExpandedMenus] = useState({}) const toggleMenu = (menuName) => { setExpandedMenus((prev) => ({ ...prev, [menuName]: !prev[menuName], })) } const handleMenuClick = (componentName) => { setActiveComponent(componentName) } return (
